&reftitle.constants; &extension.constants;
AOP_KIND_BEFORE (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before any function or method call, or before any read or write property operation.
AOP_KIND_AFTER (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered after any function or method call, or after any read or write property operation.
AOP_KIND_AROUND (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around any function or method call, or after any read or write property operation.
AOP_KIND_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered in any read or write property operation, may it be before, around of after the operation.
AOP_KIND_FUNCTION (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before, around of after a function call (not method call).
AOP_KIND_METHOD (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before, around of after a method call (not function call).
AOP_KIND_READ (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before, around of after a property read operation.
AOP_KIND_WRITE (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before, around of after a property write operation.
AOP_KIND_AROUND_WRITE_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around a property write operation.
AOP_KIND_AROUND_READ_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around a property read operation.
AOP_KIND_BEFORE_WRITE_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before a property write operation.
AOP_KIND_BEFORE_READ_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around a property read operation.
AOP_KIND_AFTER_WRITE_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered after a property write operation.
AOP_KIND_AFTER_READ_PROPERTY (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered after a property read operation.
AOP_KIND_BEFORE_METHOD (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before a method call.
AOP_KIND_AFTER_METHOD (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered after a method call.
AOP_KIND_AROUND_METHOD (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around a method call.
AOP_KIND_BEFORE_FUNCTION (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered before a function call.
AOP_KIND_AFTER_FUNCTION (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered after a function call.
AOP_KIND_AROUND_FUNCTION (integer)
Represents a joinpoint triggered around a function call.
